title: The Art of Ramona Fradon
description: For the first time ever the DEFINITIVE retrospective of Ramona Fradon's career will be presented in The Art of Ramona Fradon, highlighting the magnificent career of this artistic legend, with never-before-seen sketches. Interviewed by comic book legend Howard Chaykin, Fradon talks about her artistic career, accomplishments, and creations - from her early days at DC in the 1950's to her later work on Marvel's The Cat and Fantastic Four and DC's Plastic Man, Freedom Fighters, Super Friends, and more Featuring a forward by Walt Simonson - (well respected writer/artist known for his work on The Mighty Thor, X-Factor and many other titles)
author: Ramona Fradon
